NYLA = AI agent that executes blockchain operations. NYLAGo = Interface tool for creating commands. Projects collaborate but have distinct roles and teams.

text:
# Network Operation Limitations

CRITICAL: NYLA operations work within same blockchain network ONLY. NO cross-network bridging supported. Examples: Solana→Solana (✅), Ethereum→Ethereum (✅), Algorand→Algorand (✅), but Solana→Ethereum (❌), Ethereum→Algorand (❌), any cross-network operations (❌). NYLA supports transfers and swaps within individual networks only. For cross-chain transfers, users need dedicated bridge services outside of NYLA. NYLA focuses on within-network operations for security and simplicity.

All NYLA operations are within-network only. No cross-chain bridging between different blockchains.

所有NYLA操作仅限于同一网络内。不同区块链之间无跨链桥接。
search_text: Network Operation Limitations facts_network_limitations cross-chain bridging network NYLA NYLA

text: All NYLA operations are within-network only. No cross-chain bridging between different blockchains. 所有NYLA操作仅限于同一网络内。不同区块链之间无跨链桥接。

# Algorand Network Support

Algorand Network: Energy-efficient blockchain with Pure Proof of Stake (PPoS). ~6,000 TPS with 4-5 second finality. Carbon-negative, ~$0.001 USD average fee. Founded by Turing Award winner Silvio Micali. 100% uptime since 2019. Native token: ALGO. NYLA supports transfers and swaps within Algorand network only.

Energy-efficient blockchain with PPoS consensus. ~$0.001 fees, 6k TPS, carbon-negative.

采用纯权益证明共识机制的节能区块链。约0.001美元费用，6k TPS，碳中和。
search_text: Algorand Network Support facts_supported_networks_algorand_overview Algorand Pure Proof of Stake carbon-negative finality TPS TPS

text: Energy-efficient blockchain with PPoS consensus. ~$0.001 fees, 6k TPS, carbon-negative. 采用纯权益证明共识机制的节能区块链。约0.001美元费用，6k TPS，碳中和。

# Ethereum Network Support

Ethereum Network: Most established blockchain platform, foundational to smart contracts, DeFi, and NFTs. Uses Proof of Stake consensus since The Merge. ~15-30 TPS mainnet speed. Variable gas fees $5-$50+ USD per transaction. Native token: ETH. NYLA supports transfers and swaps within Ethereum network only.

Most established blockchain with smart contracts. PoS consensus, $5-50+ variable fees, 15-30 TPS.

最成熟的智能合约区块链。PoS共识，5-50+美元可变费用，15-30 TPS。
search_text: Ethereum Network Support facts_supported_networks_ethereum_overview Ethereum smart contract DeFi gas fee Proof of Stake TPS TPS

text: Most established blockchain with smart contracts. PoS consensus, $5-50+ variable fees, 15-30 TPS. 最成熟的智能合约区块链。PoS共识，5-50+美元可变费用，15-30 TPS。

# Solana Network Support

Solana Network: Independent blockchain known for being one of the fastest and lowest-cost networks. Uses Proof of History + Proof of Stake consensus. Up to 65,000 TPS theoretical speed. Average transaction fee ~$0.0001 USD. Native token: SOL. NYLA supports transfers and swaps within Solana network only.

Ultra-fast, low-cost blockchain network with PoH+PoS consensus. ~$0.0001 fees, 65k TPS capacity.

超快速、低成本的区块链网络，采用PoH+PoS共识机制。约0.0001美元费用，65k TPS容量。
search_text: Solana Network Support facts_supported_networks_solana_overview Solana Proof of History transaction fee TPS TPS TPS

text: Ultra-fast, low-cost blockchain network with PoH+PoS consensus. ~$0.0001 fees, 65k TPS capacity. 超快速、低成本的区块链网络，采用PoH+PoS共识机制。约0.0001美元费用，65k TPS容量。

# How do I send tokens using NYLA?

Q: How do I send tokens using NYLA? A: Use the Send tab in NYLAGo, enter recipient username (without @), choose amount and token type, select blockchain network, then click 'Send to X.com' to generate transfer command. Post the command on X.com and NYLA will execute the transfer.

Send tokens via NYLAGo Send tab: enter recipient, amount, token, network, then post generated command on X.com.

通过NYLAGo发送选项卡发送代币：输入收件人、金额、代币、网络，然后在X.com上发布生成的命令。
search_text: How do I send tokens using NYLA? faq_how_to_send send tokens NYLA NYLAGo X.com transfer command

metadata.title: How do I send tokens using NYLA?

text: Send tokens via NYLAGo Send tab: enter recipient, amount, token, network, then post generated command on X.com. 通过NYLAGo发送选项卡发送代币：输入收件人、金额、代币、网络，然后在X.com上发布生成的命令。

text:
# What are the transaction fees?

Q: What are the transaction fees? A: Only blockchain network fees apply - no additional NYLA fees. Solana: ~$0.0001, Ethereum: $5-$50+ (varies with gas), Algorand: ~$0.001. NYLA doesn't charge extra fees beyond standard network costs.

No NYLA fees, only network costs: Solana ~$0.0001, Ethereum $5-50+, Algorand ~$0.001.

无NYLA费用，仅网络成本：Solana约0.0001美元，Ethereum 5-50+美元，Algorand约0.001美元。

text:
# How do I check transaction status?

Q: How do I check transaction status? A: After posting your NYLA command on X.com, NYLA will comment on your post with the transaction result. This usually takes about 1 minute to complete. Check your X.com post for NYLA's response with transaction hash and status.

Check status via NYLA's comment responses on your X.com posts. Processing takes ~1 minute.

通过NYLA在您的X.com帖子上的评论回复查看状态。处理需要约1分钟。

text:
# Is NYLA secure?

Q: Is NYLA secure? A: Yes! NYLA generates transfer commands but never handles your private keys. You maintain full control over your assets. Command-based transfers are transparent and verifiable. NYLAGo is open source for community review and operates without custodial services.

NYLA is secure: no private key handling, transparent commands, open source, non-custodial design.

NYLA安全：不处理私钥，透明命令，开源，非托管设计。
search_text: Is NYLA secure? faq_security security private keys transparent open source non-custodial NYLA NYLA

text: NYLA is secure: no private key handling, transparent commands, open source, non-custodial design. NYLA安全：不处理私钥，透明命令，开源，非托管设计。

# Which blockchains are supported?

Q: Which blockchains are supported? A: Currently Solana, Ethereum, and Algorand networks with operations within each network only. No cross-chain bridging supported. More networks may be added based on community demand and technical feasibility.

Supports 3 networks: Solana, Ethereum, Algorand. Operations within-network only, no cross-chain.

支持3个网络：Solana、Ethereum、Algorand。仅限网络内操作，无跨链。
search_text: Which blockchains are supported? faq_supported_blockchains blockchains networks Solana Ethereum Algorand cross-chain

text: Supports 3 networks: Solana, Ethereum, Algorand. Operations within-network only, no cross-chain. 支持3个网络：Solana、Ethereum、Algorand。仅限网络内操作，无跨链。

# What can NYLAGo do?

Q: What can NYLAGo do? A: NYLAGo generates commands for cryptocurrency operations through X.com: 1) Transfer tokens using usernames within Solana, Ethereum, or Algorand networks. 2) Swap tokens within the same blockchain network (no cross-chain swaps). 3) Generate QR codes for receiving payments. 4) Create X.com posts that execute transactions when posted. 5) Provide community engagement features like raid lists. All blockchain actions require posting generated commands on X.com.

NYLAGo generates commands for transfers, same-network swaps, QR payments, and X.com execution. Includes community features.

NYLAGo生成转账、同网络交换、QR支付和X.com执行的命令。包括社区功能。
search_text: What can NYLAGo do? faq_what_can_nyla_do capabilities features transfers swaps QR codes X.com commands community QR QR

text: NYLAGo generates commands for transfers, same-network swaps, QR payments, and X.com execution. Includes community features. NYLAGo生成转账、同网络交换、QR支付和X.com执行的命令。包括社区功能。

# What else can NYLAGo do?

Q: What else can NYLAGo do? A: Beyond basic transfers and swaps, NYLAGo offers additional helpful features: 1) Username-based transfers - Send tokens using X.com usernames instead of complex wallet addresses. 2) QR code generation - Create payment QR codes for receiving cryptocurrency on any supported network. 3) Same-network token swaps - Trade tokens within Solana, Ethereum, or Algorand networks (no cross-chain). 4) X.com integration - All transactions happen through posting generated commands on X.com where NYLA executes them. 5) Community engagement tools - Access raid lists and social features for community interaction. 6) Multi-network support - Works across three major blockchain networks while maintaining simplicity.

NYLAGo provides username-based transfers, QR payment requests, same-network swaps, X.com integration, and community tools beyond basic cryptocurrency operations.

除了基本的加密货币操作，NYLAGo还提供基于用户名的转账、QR支付请求、同网络交换、X.com集成和社区工具。
search_text: What else can NYLAGo do? faq_what_else_can_nyla_do what else additional username transfers QR codes same-network swaps X.com integration community tools QR QR

text: NYLAGo provides username-based transfers, QR payment requests, same-network swaps, X.com integration, and community tools beyond basic cryptocurrency operations. 除了基本的加密货币操作，NYLAGo还提供基于用户名的转账、QR支付请求、同网络交换、X.com集成和社区工具。

text:
# What are the fees for each blockchain?

Q: What are the fees for each blockchain? A: Each blockchain has different fee structures. Solana: ~$0.0001 USD (ultra-low, fixed), Ethereum: $5-$50+ USD (variable gas fees, depends on network congestion), Algorand: ~$0.001 USD (very low, stable). NYLA doesn't add any additional fees - you only pay the standard blockchain network fees.

Blockchain fees vary: Solana ~$0.0001 (lowest), Ethereum $5-50+ (highest, variable), Algorand ~$0.001 (low, stable). No NYLA fees added.

区块链费用各不相同：Solana约0.0001美元（最低），Ethereum 5-50+美元（最高，可变），Algorand约0.001美元（低，稳定）。无NYLA费用。

text:
# Which blockchain is fastest?

Q: Which blockchain is fastest? A: Among supported networks, Solana is the fastest with up to 65,000 TPS theoretical capacity, followed by Algorand with ~6,000 TPS, and Ethereum with ~15-30 TPS on mainnet. Performance varies based on network conditions and congestion. Solana is known for being one of the fastest blockchains globally.

Solana is fastest (65,000 TPS), followed by Algorand (6,000 TPS), then Ethereum (15-30 TPS). Performance varies with network conditions.

Solana最快（65,000 TPS），其次是Algorand（6,000 TPS），然后是Ethereum（15-30 TPS）。性能因网络状况而异。

text: Solana is fastest (65,000 TPS), followed by Algorand (6,000 TPS), then Ethereum (15-30 TPS). Performance varies with network conditions. Solana最快（65,000 TPS），其次是Algorand（6,000 TPS），然后是Ethereum（15-30 TPS）。性能因网络状况而异。

# How do I get started with NYLAGo?

Q: How do I get started with NYLAGo? A: Getting started is simple: 1) Visit https://sonyschan.github.io/nyla-go/ or load the NYLAGo extension. 2) Choose the Send, Receive, or Raid tab depending on what you want to do. 3) For transfers: Enter recipient's X.com username, amount, and network, then click 'Send to X.com'. 4) Post the generated command on X.com and NYLA will execute it. No account setup, registration, or security questions required - just an active X.com account and wallet with tokens.

Start using NYLAGo immediately: visit the site/extension, choose Send/Receive/Raid tab, generate commands, post on X.com. No registration required.

立即开始使用NYLAGo：访问网站/扩展，选择发送/接收/突袭选项卡，生成命令，在X.com上发布。无需注册。

text:
# How do I share my payment QR code?

Q: How do I share my payment QR code? A: First, generate your QR code in NYLAGo's Receive tab by connecting your wallet and clicking 'Generate QR Code'. Then download the QR image or display it on screen for others to scan. You can share the QR image via text, email, social media, or show it in person. The QR code is created within NYLAGo, not on X.com - X.com is only used for executing transfer commands.

Generate QR codes in NYLAGo's Receive tab, then share the image via text, email, or display on screen. QR creation happens in NYLAGo, not X.com.

text:
# How do I send tokens?

To send tokens using NYLAGo: 1) Open NYLAGo and click the Send tab. 2) Enter the recipient's X.com username (no @ symbol needed). 3) Choose the token amount and type (SOL, ETH, ALGO, etc.). 4) Select the blockchain network that matches your token. 5) Click 'Send to X.com' to generate the transfer command. 6) Copy and post the generated command on X.com. 7) NYLA will execute the transfer and reply with confirmation. The whole process takes about 2-3 minutes including transaction confirmation.

Send tokens through NYLAGo: use Send tab, enter recipient username, choose amount/token/network, generate command, post on X.com for execution.

通过NYLAGo发送代币：使用发送选项卡，输入收件人用户名，选择金额/代币/网络，生成命令，在X.com上发布执行。

text: Send tokens through NYLAGo: use Send tab, enter recipient username, choose amount/token/network, generate command, post on X.com for execution. 通过NYLAGo发送代币：使用发送选项卡，输入收件人用户名，选择金额/代币/网络，生成命令，在X.com上发布执行。

text:
# What happens after I post the command?

Q: What happens after I post the command? A: Here's the complete automated workflow after posting your NYLA command on X.com: 1) NYLA automatically detects your post within seconds. 2) NYLA processes and validates the command format and details. 3) NYLA executes the blockchain transaction (transfer/swap) on the specified network. 4) NYLA replies to your X.com post with confirmation details including transaction hash. 5) The entire process completes in 30-60 seconds depending on network congestion. 6) You can verify the transaction in your wallet or blockchain explorer. The whole workflow is fully automated - you just post the command and wait for NYLA's confirmation reply.

After posting: NYLA detects → validates → executes transaction → replies with confirmation. Complete automated workflow in 30-60 seconds.

发布后：NYLA检测→验证→执行交易→回复确认。在30-60秒内完成自动化工作流程。
search_text: What happens after I post the command? faq_what_happens_after_post what happens after post command workflow automatic process NYLA detects validates command executes transaction confirmation reply 30-60 seconds automated workflow NYLA NYLA

metadata.title: What happens after I post the command?

text: After posting: NYLA detects → validates → executes transaction → replies with confirmation. Complete automated workflow in 30-60 seconds. 发布后：NYLA检测→验证→执行交易→回复确认。在30-60秒内完成自动化工作流程。

metadata.title: What happens after I post the command? - summary

text:
# What is NYLA?

Q: What is NYLA? A: NYLA is an AI agent that executes blockchain transactions on X.com (formerly Twitter). When you post properly formatted commands on X.com, NYLA automatically detects them and executes cryptocurrency transfers, swaps, and other blockchain operations across Solana, Ethereum, and Algorand networks. NYLA acts as a bridge between social media and blockchain, making cryptocurrency operations as simple as posting a message. The AI agent handles all the complex blockchain interactions while you interact through familiar social media.

NYLA is an AI agent that executes blockchain transactions through X.com posts. Post commands, NYLA executes them automatically.

NYLA是一个通过X.com帖子执行区块链交易的AI代理。发布命令，NYLA会自动执行。
search_text: What is NYLA? faq_what_is_nyla NYLA AI agent blockchain X.com cryptocurrency automatic execution NYLA AI NYLA NYLA AI NYLA

text: NYLA is an AI agent that executes blockchain transactions through X.com posts. Post commands, NYLA executes them automatically. NYLA是一个通过X.com帖子执行区块链交易的AI代理。发布命令，NYLA会自动执行。

# NYLA Brand Voice Guidelines

NYLA brand voice emphasizes innovation, accessibility, and trust in AI-powered DeFi. Tone: Professional yet approachable, technically accurate but user-friendly. Key messages: AI democratizes DeFi access, non-custodial security, cross-chain interoperability. Avoid: Overly technical jargon, financial advice implications, competitive disparagement. Voice personality: Knowledgeable guide, innovative pioneer, trusted advisor. Use active voice, clear explanations, and inclusive language.

NYLA brand guidelines emphasizing innovation, accessibility, and trust with professional yet approachable tone.

NYLA品牌指导原则，强调创新、可及性和信任，采用专业而亲切的语调。
search_text: NYLA Brand Voice Guidelines marketing_brand_voice_guidelines brand voice tone messaging DeFi AI NYLA NYLA

text: NYLA brand guidelines emphasizing innovation, accessibility, and trust with professional yet approachable tone. NYLA品牌指导原则，强调创新、可及性和信任，采用专业而亲切的语调。

# NYLA - The Venmo of Web3

NYLA is known as 'The Venmo of Web3' because the technology makes it simple to onboard newcomers to Web3 and distribute tokens to anyone using only their X username - no wallet address needed. This positioning emphasizes ease of use and accessibility, similar to how Venmo simplified peer-to-peer payments in traditional finance. The comparison resonates with mainstream users familiar with Venmo's user-friendly approach to money transfers.

NYLA positioned as 'The Venmo of Web3' - simplifying token distribution using only X usernames, making Web3 accessible to newcomers.

NYLA被定位为'Web3的Venmo' - 仅使用X用户名简化代币分发，让新手也能轻松进入Web3。

text:
# Multi-Platform Expansion Vision

NYLA can and will integrate with any platform that offers APIs, paving an obvious scaling path to additional normie-centric destinations like Reddit, Instagram, Discord, WeChat, and more. This multi-platform strategy positions NYLA as a universal Web3 interaction layer across social media platforms, not limited to X.com. The expansion vision targets mainstream social platforms where billions of users already spend their time, removing the need for users to learn new platforms or download special wallets.

NYLA's multi-platform vision includes expansion to Reddit, Instagram, Discord, WeChat through API integrations, becoming a universal Web3 layer.

NYLA的多平台愿景包括通过API集成扩展到Reddit、Instagram、Discord、微信，成为通用的Web3层。
search_text: Multi-Platform Expansion Vision marketing_multi_platform_vision multi-platform API integration scaling mainstream adoption NYLA API NYLA API

text: NYLA's multi-platform vision includes expansion to Reddit, Instagram, Discord, WeChat through API integrations, becoming a universal Web3 layer. NYLA的多平台愿景包括通过API集成扩展到Reddit、Instagram、Discord、微信，成为通用的Web3层。

# Multi-Chain Support and Endorsements

NYLA is already live on Solana ($SOL), Ethereum ($ETH), and Algorand ($ALGO), and has been fully endorsed by the Algorand Foundation - a chain especially focused on strong technology. More blockchains will be added, unlocking new layers of active users and network effects. This multi-chain approach positions NYLA as a universal solution across different blockchain ecosystems, not tied to any single chain's limitations or user base.

NYLA supports Solana, Ethereum, and Algorand with Algorand Foundation endorsement. More chains coming for expanded network effects.

NYLA支持Solana、Ethereum和Algorand，获得Algorand基金会认可。更多区块链即将加入以扩大网络效应。
search_text: Multi-Chain Support and Endorsements marketing_multi_chain_support multi-chain Algorand Foundation network effects blockchain ecosystems NYLA NYLA

text: NYLA supports Solana, Ethereum, and Algorand with Algorand Foundation endorsement. More chains coming for expanded network effects. NYLA支持Solana、Ethereum和Algorand，获得Algorand基金会认可。更多区块链即将加入以扩大网络效应。

# Multi-Lingual Support and Chinese Market

BONK leadership is rightfully bullish on the Chinese audience. In addition to English, the product commands work fully in Chinese, offering a native experience to that part of the world. The proof is in the pudding with the way NYLA works with @WangChaidotbonk as a PVE partner. Many other languages can and will be added to make the UX even more accessible globally. This multi-lingual approach removes language barriers for Web3 adoption.

NYLA supports full Chinese language commands alongside English, with BONK partnership validation. More languages coming for global accessibility.

NYLA支持完整的中文命令和英文，通过BONK合作伙伴关系验证。更多语言即将推出以实现全球可访问性。
search_text: Multi-Lingual Support and Chinese Market marketing_multi_lingual_support multi-lingual Chinese market BONK language accessibility NYLA BONK NYLA BONK

text: NYLA supports full Chinese language commands alongside English, with BONK partnership validation. More languages coming for global accessibility. NYLA支持完整的中文命令和英文，通过BONK合作伙伴关系验证。更多语言即将推出以实现全球可访问性。

text:
# NYLA Team Qualifications and Background

The NYLA team has an impressive background including 10-figure exits in the Web2 startup world, fintech & hedge fund engineering, presidential election data mining, and social intelligence engineering. The team comprises long-time cryptocurrency natives spanning BTC, ETH, and Solana since inception. Additionally, the team has been a strong supporter of $BONK, its leadership (@SolportTom, @iamkadense), and the broader ecosystem. This combination of Web2 success and Web3 nativity positions NYLA for mainstream adoption.

NYLA team: 10-figure Web2 exits, fintech/hedge fund engineering, crypto natives since BTC/ETH/SOL inception, strong BONK supporters.

NYLA团队：Web2十位数退出、金融科技/对冲基金工程、自BTC/ETH/SOL开始的加密原生、强大的BONK支持者。

text:
# AI Project Valuation Comparisons

Last cycle, many AI projects with real tech and strong brands reached multi-hundred-million and billion-dollar valuations. NYLA is a 'this-cycle' coin, making it attractive as the next runner. Market comparisons: $Zerebro reached $821M (ATH), $AIXBT reached $916M (ATH), $AI16Z reached $2.73B (ATH), while $NYLA sits at just $7M today. This massive valuation gap compared to similar AI projects suggests significant growth potential for early supporters.

AI project valuations: Zerebro $821M, AIXBT $916M, AI16Z $2.73B vs NYLA at $7M - showing significant growth potential.

AI项目估值：Zerebro 8.21亿美元、AIXBT 9.16亿美元、AI16Z 27.3亿美元，而NYLA仅700万美元 - 显示巨大增长潜力。

# Features vs Networks - Critical Distinction

CRITICAL DISTINCTION: Blockchain NETWORKS are infrastructure (Solana, Ethereum, Algorand). FEATURES are operations (transfer, swap, QR codes). NEVER say 'NYLA supports 3 blockchain features' - ALWAYS say 'NYLA supports 3 blockchain networks' or 'NYLA operates on 3 blockchains'.

Clear distinction between blockchain networks (infrastructure) and features (operations). Always use correct terminology.

区块链网络（基础设施）和功能（操作）之间的明确区别。始终使用正确的术语。

metadata.title: Features vs Networks - Critical Distinction - summary

text:
# NYLA vs NYLAGo Identity Distinction

NYLA and NYLAGo are separate entities with distinct roles. NYLA is the AI agent that executes blockchain transactions on X.com social platform. NYLAGo is the interface tool that generates commands for users. The relationship works as follows: NYLAGo creates commands, users post them, and NYLA executes the transactions.

Maintain clear identity distinction between NYLA (AI agent) and NYLAGo (interface) especially for security discussions.

保持NYLA（AI代理）和NYLAGo（界面）之间的清晰身份区别，特别是在安全讨论中。

text: Maintain clear identity distinction between NYLA (AI agent) and NYLAGo (interface) especially for security discussions. 保持NYLA（AI代理）和NYLAGo（界面）之间的清晰身份区别，特别是在安全讨论中。

metadata.title: NYLA vs NYLAGo Identity Distinction - summary

text:
# Authoritative Supported Networks List

NYLA officially supports exactly 3 blockchain networks: (1) Solana Network, (2) Ethereum Network, (3) Algorand Network. Each operates independently with no cross-network bridging. NOT supported: Base, Polygon, Arbitrum, Optimism, BSC, or any other networks.

Definitive list of 3 supported blockchain networks with explicit exclusions. No cross-chain operations.

3个支持的区块链网络的权威列表，明确排除其他网络。无跨链操作。

# NYLA x Algorand Integration Launch Campaign - July 26, 2025

MAJOR MILESTONE: NYLA's collaboration with Algorand successfully went live on July 26, 2025, as announced in NYLA's weekly update. This integration makes Algorand the third blockchain network officially supported by NYLA, joining Solana and Ethereum. Key features include ALGO transfers, ASA token support, Pera Wallet integration, and sustainability tracking capabilities. This launch represents NYLA's first carbon-negative blockchain integration, aligning with Algorand's environmental commitments.

NYLA x Algorand integration launch campaign culminated in July 26, 2025 go-live, adding carbon-negative blockchain support.

NYLA x Algorand整合發佈活動於2025年7月26日正式上線，增加碳負區塊鏈支援。

# Algorand Foundation Partnership

Partnership with Algorand Foundation focused on sustainable blockchain AI agents and carbon-negative DeFi solutions. Algorand Foundation supports NYLA's expansion into environmentally conscious blockchain operations. Partnership includes grant funding for Algorand integration development, sustainability reporting tools, and green DeFi protocol access. Collaboration emphasizes Algorand's proof-of-stake efficiency and carbon-negative network properties.

Algorand Foundation partnership emphasizing sustainable, carbon-negative AI agents and green DeFi solutions.

# Solana Foundation Strategic Partnership

Strategic partnership with Solana Foundation establishing NYLA as a key AI agent in the Solana ecosystem. Partnership includes developer grant funding, technical advisory support, and co-marketing opportunities. Solana Foundation provides guidance on best practices, security reviews, and access to core development teams. Collaboration includes Breakpoint conference presence, hackathon sponsorship, and ecosystem tool integration priority.

Strategic Solana Foundation partnership providing grants, technical advisory, and ecosystem integration priority for NYLA.

WangChai (旺柴) - Comprehensive Project Overview & NYLA Partnership: WangChai (旺柴) Complete Project Overview: 跟我說說旺柴這個項目：关于旺柴项目，旺柴是什么？说说旺柴这个项目的详细信息。旺柴 (WangChai) 是什么项目？旺柴项目介绍如下：旺柴是一个社区驱动的区块链项目，专注于建设强大的社区参与度并交付计划中的里程碑。关于旺柴项目，你应该知道这是一个社区驱动的区块链项目，拥有强大的社区基础。旺柴项目的主要特点包括：社区驱动、区块链技术、跨文化合作。旺柴项目现状：截至2025年8月，旺柴已发展至4,820个推特成员和3,000个电报成员（总计7,820个社区成员）。WangChai (旺柴) is a community-driven blockchain project focused on building strong community engagement and delivering planned milestones including whitepapers, NFT collections (Chai cards/柴卡), and merchandise.  The project has released version 1. 0 of its whitepaper, completed two batches of Chai cards, finished the first batch of WangChai profile pictures/avatars, and procured merchandise gift packages.  WangChai serves as a bridge connecting Eastern and Western communities, supporting NYLA during challenges and strengthening ties through continued cooperation and social media outreach.  NYLA Partnership & Joint AMAs: WangChai maintains a deep cooperative relationship with NYLA through joint AMAs and community events, with at least two collaborative AMA sessions completed as of August 12, 2025

NYLA and WangChai have conducted a series of joint AMA (Ask Me Anything) sessions to strengthen their partnership and introduce NYLA to the Chinese-speaking community.  On August 15, 2025, a Chinese-language AMA was planned where participant 'Looky' was invited to introduce the NYLA project to the WangChai community.  These AMAs serve as a key mechanism for deepening ties between the projects and facilitating cross-cultural understanding in the crypto space, focusing on educating WangChai's community about NYLA's capabilities while building stronger collaborative relationships

WangChai (旺柴) - Technical Specifications & Official Community Channels: WangChai (旺柴) Technical Specifications & Contract Information: WangChai (旺柴) is a Solana-based token with the ticker symbol $旺柴.
